Package Utilities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStatistics
    This injectable interface represents a Statistics Utility to be used for statistical calculations and management.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alert
    This utility class pushes an alert to the screen.
    MailSender
    This class allows sending mails from the server to remote client mails
    MessageObject
    This class is the universal-type object send to the server via sendToServer(object) method.
    ScreenManager
    This class is made to manage a collection of screens and the switching between them.
    Statistics
    This class represents a Statistics Utility to be used for statistical calculations and management.

    getLinkedRequests is for get all the requests that involve the user ID;
